cost_functions.name: r95_till_friction_angle
cost_functions.definition: 95% of till friction is within this fraction of its target

cost_functions.name: p95_ice_thickness
cost_functions.definition: 95% of ice thickness is within this range of its target

cost_functions.name: r95_ice_velocity
cost_functions.definition: 95% of ice velocity is within this fraction of its target

cost_functions.name: n_dt_ice
cost_functions.definition: total number of ice-dynamical time steps

cost_functions.name: n_Axb_its
cost_functions.definition: total number of linear solver iterations
